tool_description: Optimizes frequency reuse patterns to minimize co-channel interference while maximizing spectral efficiency across a cellular network.

site_ids.description: Sites to optimize frequency assignments for

reuse_pattern.description: Frequency reuse strategy (adaptive, cluster-3, cluster-7, cluster-12)

interference_threshold_db.description: Maximum acceptable co-channel interference level in dB

error_messages: Insufficient channels: Number of available channels must be at least 1/3 of sites for viable reuse.
Invalid reuse pattern: Use adaptive, cluster-3, cluster-7, or cluster-12 patterns.
Interference threshold out of range: Threshold must be between 6-30 dB.
Invalid optimization objective: Use interference, capacity, or coverage objectives.
usage: Provide sites and available channels with optimization parameters. Returns optimized frequency assignments minimizing interference.
